executable.title: ConstellationDetectorGUI (BRAINS)
executable.description: This program provides the user with a GUI tool to view/manipulate landmarks for an input volume.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Image Volume Filename
image.description: The filename of the input NIfTI volume to view/manipulate

file.name: inputLandmarks
file.label: Input Landmarks Filename
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (in a .fcsv format) with the landmarks in the original image space in it to be read in.

file.name: outputLandmarks
file.label: Output Landmarks Filename
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (in a .fcsv format) with the landmarks in the original image space in it to be written.
